com.radiantlogic.iddm.annotations

Annotation Type Property


  • @Target(value={TYPE,PARAMETER})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
public @interface Property
    Marks a parameter or type where IDDM should automatically inject configuration data.

    This annotation applies only to ManagedComponent and CustomConnector annotated classes. It is applied to public constructor parameters to request that IDDM automatically provide the named property data when the connector framework instantiates a new instance of the class.

    To use, the developer applies this annotation to a constructor's method parameter and specifies the name of the property to inject. In the example below, the IDDM connector framework will automatically inject a ReadOnlyProperties object into the connectionProperties parameter when constructing a new CustomApiClient: 

    
 public CustomApiClient(
     @Property(name = CUSTOM_DATASOURCE_PROPERTIES) ReadOnlyProperties connectionProperties) {
     // ...implementation details...
 }

    See InjectableProperties for a list of available properties and expected parameter types.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      InjectableProperties name
      Names the injectable property this parameter or type represents.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract InjectableProperties name
        Names the injectable property this parameter or type represents.
        Returns:
        The InjectableProperties enum value representing the property name
